Shari is wonderful , polite and friendly Can always rely on her.

Opus Virtual Offices have been a great partner for our small business. They are reliable and consistent with forwarding business mail. Their staff is always helpful and their online support is excellent.

OPUS has been a game-changer for business! Their virtual office services are seamless, professional, and truly top-notch. From the prestigious business address to the exceptional mail handling and customer support, every aspect of their service is designed to help businesses thrive. The team at OPUS is responsive, friendly, and always goes above and beyond to accommodate my needs. Having a reliable virtual office has not only enhanced my brand image but also allowed me to focus more on growing my business without worrying about the small details. I highly recommend OPUS to any entrepreneur or small business owner looking for a professional, hassle-free virtual office solution. Five stars all the way!

OpusVo has been great for our business from answering all calls and managing our mail correspondence. We have continuously great commendations from our clients and customers for the professionalism and efficiency. - Thank you, Alex Vargas and the whole team

I've had great support from everyone at the office, particularly Angela. She's been extremely helpful and proactive in making sure we get important information (critical for our business) as soon as possible both digitally and physically. She's a great asset to our collaboration with Opus Virtual Offices at Houston.
This office is great. Jen is helpful and just wonderful around. Office is clean and definitely a good office to have
Upscale office spaces with beautiful views. Professional atmosphere, and amazing secretary Jen makes everyone feel welcome!

The service I received directly from the owner was way passed my expectations. The fact it was the owner and not an employee already blew my mind. The degree of expertise he has and knowledge was what did it for me.

I want to express my appreciation for the outstanding customer service provided by Crystal during my appointment with my attorney. She was welcoming and professional. Their attention to detail and friendly demeanor created a positive experience from the moment I walked in. Excellent job!

I canâ€™t recommend Opus Virtual Offices enough! Their reasonably priced products and services have truly given my business the professional edge I needed. From their top-notch virtual office setups to the seamless communication tools, everything is designed to enhance efficiency and create a polished, professional image. The convenience of having a dedicated business address and live receptionist services without the high overhead costs has been a game-changer. If youâ€™re looking for an affordable and reliable virtual office solution, Opus is the way to go!

Overall, her friendly and proactive approach made me feel valued as a customer. It was a refreshing experience that truly stood out.

I am truly impressed by Angela's exceptional service in helping me organize and sort out my paperwork. Her attention to detail, dedication, and expertise were evident throughout the process. Angela's ability to streamline the task and her clear communication made the often overwhelming task seem effortless. She went above and beyond, ensuring every document was organized and easily accessible. Her professionalism and friendly demeanor further enhanced the experience. Angela's outstanding performance undoubtedly turned a daunting task into a seamless and satisfying endeavor.

My receptionist Meredith is such an awesome assistant. She handles my mail and calls professionally. Meredith makes sure to keep me abreast on my daily mail and tasks. I would recommend her for any Nashville business.

Dear Opus VO Management Team, I wish to extend my deepest appreciation and recognition for the outstanding service I received from Ms. Lesli Vargas following my recent acquisition of the Opus VO package on July 21st. Within a commendably brief span of less than 48 hours post my purchase, I was delighted to receive an email from Ms. Vargas. The content of her correspondence not only conveyed important details but was framed in such a manner that made me genuinely feel welcomed and valued as a member of the Opus VO community. Furthermore, Ms. Vargas diligently ensured open lines of communication, extending her contact details and personally reaching out via phone a few days later for an introduction. Such gestures, though seemingly simple, are reflective of her proactive commitment to fostering client relationships. Drawing from her extensive experience, notably from her tenure at Regus, Ms. Vargas possesses an in-depth understanding of the industry. It was evident in our conversations that she is a passionate advocate for Opus VO. As someone who has previously engaged with Regus, I confided in Ms. Vargas my intent to redirect associates, friends, and family towards Opus VO, largely attributable to the value proposition Opus VO offers in comparison to competitors. As the founder and CEO of Lamb IT Solutions, LLC, I have had myriad interactions with professionals from various sectors. I can assertively state that Ms. Vargas exemplifies the very essence of professionalism, subject matter expertise, and genuine client engagement. In conclusion, Ms. Lesli Vargas is undoubtedly an asset to Opus VO, reinforcing the brand's commitment to excellence. I am certain her contributions will continue to enhance your brand's reputation. It's a privilege to have professionals like her as the face of your organization. Warm regards, James Lamb, Jr. Founder & CEO Lamb IT Solutions, LLC.
Angela was amazing walking me through the office and the process.

Shari Stein, the First Impression Coordinator at Opus, is fantastic. She consistently goes above and beyond to ensure everything runs smoothly. Her professionalism, attention to detail, and friendly demeanor make every interaction a pleasure. Shari is always prompt and efficient and truly enhances the experience at Opus. Shari is the best!

I have been at Opus for years - and have been extremely happy with the set up and services. Shari is exceptional - she always goes above and beyond providing exemplary attention to my clients and my business.

I find the office very well run and the staff, especially Shari Stein, extremely helpful. When I do have clients come to the office for a meeting, I have no concerns about the appearance of the office.

Shari at the Boca Raton office location of Opus has been a pleasure to work with. Shari is extremely knowledgeable, professional and personable. She is a hard worker and goes out of her way to assist her clients. Shari is a tremendous asset.
Very organized and professional staff. Highly recommend to all!
Always a good and smooth experience, The assistant is always helpful, would recommend to anyone in the area.
This was absolutely the right choice for my law firm. In addition, Shari in the Boca Office is fantastic!

I have been using Opus Virtual Rooms in Austin for several months, and my experience has been outstanding! The virtual office space is equipped with numerous amenities that cater to all my professional needs, making it an ideal environment for productivity. A special mention goes to Karen at the front desk. She is incredibly helpful and attentive, always ensuring that everything runs smoothly. Her professionalism and friendly demeanor make a significant difference, and she is always ready to assist with any request or question. Overall, Opus Virtual Rooms provides a top-notch service, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a reliable and well-equipped virtual office space in Austin. ---

I have been a customer of Opus Virtual Offices for a number of years now with several of my companies. Their structure of handling calls, mail and notifications, etc. has worked perfectly for me, since I no longer needed my larger office space. Their staff is well trained and efficient, especially Shari Stein, with whom I usually interact. Thank you Opus!
Melissa is phenomenal and the main reason I have stayed with Opus for 5 years. She is helpful, intelligent, professional, and courteous. 5 stars to her!

I am writing to commend Alex for her exceptional service. Throughout my interactions with her, I have consistently been impressed by her professionalism, efficiency, and courteous demeanor. I can always count on her, thank you!
Karen went above and beyond to make sure I got everything I needed.

It was very easy setting up the virtual office location Online. Since I live nearby, I went in to the office and (Karen White), the receptionist was very helpful in assisting me in completing the on boarding process as well as explaining service and facility features. She was warm, professional, and kind.
Awesome, Friendly Staff! Brittany is extremely patient and always helps me locate my packages! Would definitely recommend! 10/10
We have worked with opus for years and specifically Britney! She has been responsive, professional, pleasant, responsible, trustworthy all of the traits you would want in a virtual assistant!
I honestly love the Buckhead location best. Itâ€™s SUPER convenient and the receptionist at this location is very nice and helpful.

Good Afternoon, I have nothing but great things to say about Brittany and this location. The service is exceptional and so is her professionalism. My mail, the phone service and even the meeting space is always consistently where I need it to be, which is at a high standard and timely. Thanks again Brittany I love how you represent our business!
Brittany is a wonderful resource and representative of Opus and of my virtual business. She's professional, thorough, and attentive. A+++

I have been a client at this office for 5 years. The location In the heart of buckhead is very convenient for me. And every time i stop by the receptionist Britney is there to greet me with a smile and friendly welcome. Sheâ€™s very helpful with anything i need. Rooms are clean and she always has snacks available :) I would definitely recommend this office for your business!!!
I love the service. I want to send a suggestion for us to make manual payments on our account prior to the due date in order to pay early.
Very professional service.
True professional customer service!
Top notch!
Its in a great location, and comes with great features for the price.
The site is easy to navigate.  I had entered in the wrong email and had to call the help desk and they were fast and prompt with correcting my email address.  Very friendly.
Choosing Opus has been the best decision that I have made for my small business.
It was the best Decision I made . And Britney at the Atlanta Offic is the best

I evaluated a lot of virtual office services prior to selecting Opus Virtual Offices. Their monthly fee is very reasonable and gives my company a polished look. Utilizing this service has helped my business expand as I can meet my client and potential clients in a central location. This is especially helpful when it comes to the Atlanta area! Highly Recommended.

Been using the service for 2 years and absolutely love them.  We use them for two different locations one in Ohio and one in Atlanta.  Opus is very responsive to your inquiries.  I have never had any issues with my mail or booking conference rooms.  Onsite staff is always friendly and helpful.  I would highly recommend OVO.
Great service provided by OPUS for my company. Their Wilmington office provide great service. I have Opus office for past 2-3 years. No Problems.
I absolutely love my experience and service with Opus VO.
I am very satisfied with the service. I plan to increase the usage of OPUS for my business in the near future.
It has been great! super efficient and zero complaints. Staff are very attentive and reliable
Opus provides my business with administrative solutions and options that helps me operate in ways I couldn't otherwise imagine. Thank you.

I have been with Opus for almost 3 years and they have been nothing but great! I wish every service provider was like them. Also, I truly appreciate how they consistently continue to upgrade their service. A++++

I have had a very positive experience at Opus's 515 Los Olas Blvd., Ft. Lauderdale Office. My mail is secure, incoming calls are handled professionally, the receptionist is very congenial, and the conference rooms are kept clean. I plan ahead as best as possible, and therefore have no conference room scheduling issues.

I evaluated a lot of virtual office services prior to selecting Opus Virtual Offices. Their monthly fee is very reasonable versus what you get in terms of services and a good address for your company or organization. Our company has been using them for over 2 years and we have no intentions of changing. BTW, virtual doesn't mean no people to help you, the staff at our location has always been great and ready to help us whenever we needed assistance. Great service and easy to business with. Highly recommended.

I must say this is the best thing for me starting up a business and having a virtual offices. I love opus virtual offices because i can get all fax to my email which I'm so big on, and also all forward calls come to my phone as well. I love the fact if you need to have a meeting you can login and see if there is meeting space is open and book it. This is a best way for all upcoming business to start out. All the workers at Opus Virtual offices are so nice as well. -Gladiator Capital Invesment LLC

Opus office has been a big help to the virtual office have given me and corporate ran looking office without me having to be in and office on a daily basis. The phone forwarding lets me get my calls wherever am at are send them to my voice mail and get the message later. The live answering by the reception makes it more professional I recommend Opus with anyone starting and business are working from home.
I highly recommend them.
They do a great job.
Fast, Accurate, Professional
My Dallas Office location in Turtle Creek. Love it!!!
Opus Virtual Offices is professional and good at what they do. The services have helped me a lot in getting business noticed by top clients and more. Try'em, they're just that good!!
An affordable option to establish a professional presence for my home-based business.
They are very responsive so far. The set up seems relatively straightforward and easy. I will give a review on the actual service in about 30 days, but so far, great service!
Wow these people are phone wizards!
Their sign up was as quick and easy as I've ever experienced.
I'm still getting but everything I've learned is all positive, just the right thing for a new business to establish a business address without the brick and mortar.
Donna was extremely comforting and professional. She answered all of my questions and concerns. She also made sure I left the call with a smile on my face.
